summary: LETTER FROM D. GRIMES (VA) WANTED RESPONSE TO HIS INQUIRY ON A RECALL INTIATED BY NHTSA CONCERNING ABS BRAKE FAILURE ON 1998, ISUZU, RODEO; RECALL 02I002000; NO RECORD OF E-MAIL IN SYSTEM; REPLY TO RICHMOND, VA OFC, REFERENCE DAVID C. GRIMES, DOT/#2003-2228.  *AK
